title: Coach's Clipboard
description: React SPA for coaches and PE teachers with a mobile first design that's meant to replace the clipboard. Utilizes Redux, React Router, and Firebase for the database

title: Sonic Adventure
description: Kids scavenger hunt that gives clues and asks for correct answers before giving the next clue. Utilizes React with JSON files for the information. JavaScript and CSS used for countdown animation. (Project will be online soon)

title: Armored Coatings
description: Clean and simple website using HTML, custom CSS, Bootstrap, and JavaScript. Zipcode API will be implemented in estimate modal for more accurate estimates.

title: Chorzy
description: The app functions as a chore and allowance tracker for families. Utilizes React, Firebase, Redux toolkit, React Router and other front end technologies.

title: Baseball Profile
description: Baseball profile web app to see personal info, league stats, and training videos. The app uses fake data to simulate data from a database or api.  Uses React, Bootstrap, React Router and other front end technologies.
